text: Interstellar Probe is a 1999 space probe concept by NASA. The proposed probe was using solar sails with a 0.25 AU flyby of the Sun, The probe would use a radioisotope thermoelectric generator for electrical power. == Related pages == * Interstellar Probe (spacecraft), another proposed spacecraft by NASA * Innovative Interstellar Explorer, another proposed probe by NASA. * New Horizons 2, a proposed mission to the trans-Neptunian objects. * Shensuo (spacecraft), two proposed probes by CNSA. * TAU (spacecraft), proposed nuclear electric rocket in the late 1980s * Project Orion, proposed nuclear pulse propulsion craft.
title: Interstellar Probe (1999)
